remarks: Image of a limit under a continuous map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
statement:
rlimcn1b.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. X ) $.
rlimcn1b.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
rlimcn1b.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> B ) ~~>r C ) $.
rlimcn1b.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
rlimcn1b.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ A. z e. X ( ( abs ` ( z - C ) ) < y -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` z ) - ( F ` C ) ) ) < x ) ) $.
rlimcn1b $p |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> ( F ` B ) ) ~~>r ( F ` C ) ) $.
$d A k x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F k x y z $.
$d X k z $.
$d k ph x y $.
